text: Flavio Cipolla and Dudi Sela were the defending champions, but chose not to participate this year. Roman Jebavý and Jiří Veselý won the title, defeating Tuna Altuna and Alessandro Motti in the final, 6–0, 6–0. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== * Main Draw Istanbul Open - Doubles Category:2017 in Istanbul 2017 Doubles Category:2017 in Turkish sport
title: 2017 Istanbul Open – Doubles
